Articles.Content:
Demo challenge :

The demo is limited, everybody has the same parts, and no mods exist. and even those who haven't bought the game can play.

What you do is up to you, build mass relays using only your limited parts, fly into Kerbol, make cannons... The point of the challenge is to see who can make the whackiest thing and most whackjob-ish things... As a prize I'm going to make one of my pixel art flags and a picture for your signature soontm. (if this gets popular)

only rule is that it must be the 18._ demo.

Have fun..
